Package com.irurueta.hermes

Class ComparableCollectionItemChangeDetector<T extends ComparableItem<T>>

java.lang.Object
com.irurueta.hermes.AbstractCollectionItemChangeDetector<T>
com.irurueta.hermes.ComparableCollectionItemChangeDetector<T>
Type Parameters:
T - type of items (which must extend from ComparableItem).
public class ComparableCollectionItemChangeDetector<T extends ComparableItem<T>> extends AbstractCollectionItemChangeDetector<T>
Class to detect changes between two collections of comparable items.
